game.short_description: Work in Progress. You have stranded on the planet Hades. Use your limited supplies to survive and use terraforming to create a beautiful habitable place. (EARLY TEST VERSION)

long_description:
[Shared forum topic](https://forum.minetest.net/viewtopic.php?t=26747)

Mod [Biofuel](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Lokrates/biofuel/) modified for [Hades Revisited](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/).

In github code follow branch [sfence_hades_revisited](https://github.com/sfence/biofuel/tree/sfence_hades_revisited).
name: hades_biofuel
title: Biofuel for Hades Revisited
